fields.description:
hi everyone!

Please, check it

Error description:

[ERROR] System Error while compiling Android classes.dex
[ERROR] Unable to open 'C: \ Users \ ludico8 \ Desktop \ MiBuild \ MyTest4Me.apk' as zip archive


I need help, I have several days of trying to solve this problem but can not find any solution, when I select "Distribute - App Store" from Titanium Studio tells me to enter the Keystore Location, ok, far everything is going well, (thanks to the following command i could create my Keystore)
I understand that this key parameter must have, for example: "alias" is very important, "PASSWORD", among others. Here is the command that uses an example to guide me:

keytool-genkey-alias-keystore sector08 C: \ Users \ ludico8 \. android \ debug.keystore-keysize 2048-validity 10000

The problem comes after loading the key, throws the error I specified that the image attached to this issue.

I hope you can help me, I need to fix, and I think I've tried everything: (
fields.summary: Please   [ERROR] System Error while compiling Android classes.dex [ERROR] --  Unable to open 'C:\Users\ludico8\Desktop\MiBuild\MyTest4Me.apk' as zip archive
fields.environment:
On windows 7 x64
About Titanium Studio:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606

Date: 19 February 2013, 16:09:49

comments.body:
This does not seem like a bug, rather an issue on your end. Please search the Community QA for suggestions since other users have run into this before. 

http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/127964/error---system-error-while-compiling-android-classesdex
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/128580/error-while-compiling-android-classesdex

it seems like you do not have the require Java JDK. have you reinstalled them and tried again? Please use Community QA as your outlet for such issues.
